Parents of Career and Success Academy,
Check your email or text message, it‚Äôs time to re-enroll your student for the 2020-21 school year!
Re-enrollment is our annual process to determine if your student will return for the next school year. This online process will take place on our SchoolMint site.
This is an important step to secure your students spot for the upcoming school year.
For each student, click Returning or Not Returning for the 2020-21 school year.
If your student is Returning, a Re-enroll button will appear for you to complete the required re-enrollment forms.
DO NOT click Add New Student. You are re-enrolling a current student.
DO NOT create a new account for your student(s)
If you have any questions about any required forms or need to speak to a school representative, please contact our office at enrollment@careeracademysb.com. If you encounter a technical error, please contact technical support at SchoolMint, support@schoolmint.com.
